index.metaDescription: Free online developer tools collection: Base64 encoder/decoder, JSON formatter, regex tester, timestamp converter, URL encoder, hash generator, and 20+ productivity tools. Privacy-friendly, fast, and mobile-optimized.
diff.pageTitle: Text Diff — Compare & Highlight Differences | Multi-function Toolbox
diff.pageDescription: Compare two texts side-by-side and highlight additions/deletions. Ideal for code reviews, copy edits, and spotting changes quickly.

regex-tester.pageDescription: Test regular expression patterns against sample text with live match highlighting and capture groups to speed up regex debugging.
